content.query:
CREATE VIEW [reporting].[fact_sales]
	AS 
	SELECT 
	sh.Sales_Order_ID, sh.Order_Date, sh.Due_Date, sh.Sales_Order_Number,sh.Ship_date, sh.Customer_ID, sh.Ship_to_Address_ID,
	sh.Bill_To_Address_ID, sd.Sales_Order_Detail_ID, sd.Order_Qty, sd.Product_ID, sd.Unit_Price, sd.Unit_Price_Discount,sd.Line_Total
	 FROM [dbo].[SalesOrderDetail] sd
	LEFT JOIN [dbo].[salesOrderHeader] sh on sd.Sales_Order_ID = sh.Sales_Order_ID
